name: Bliz Tanks War: Hard Armor 3D
description:
Military draft started: enlist today and start your soldiering at armored force! It’s not a training alert or sham fight, but real military conflict, and the whole world id involved in this war. You have to protect your country, you have to take part into epic tank battles. Faithful companions will back you up shoot in. So jump into your tanks and prepare to your first battle in Blitz Tanks War: Hard Armor 3D military campaign!

Lead your iron legion to victory, give directions, attack enemy tanks, earn points and gain experience.

BLITZ TANKS WAR: HARD ARMOR 3D GAME FEATURES:
- Unlock bonuses and upgrades to crush your enemies;
- Try different tactics and strategies and find the best one;
- Fight in one team with highly intellectual bots;
- Shoot to kill using different weapon;
- Complete several missions on different battlefields;
- Enjoy high-quality graphics, real shooting sounds and smooth animation;
- Stunning gameplay won’t let you get bored.

Blitz Tanks War: Hard Armor 3D – focus on the war missions, drive your tank, shoot carefully and become a winner!
